meanings.definition: The state or quality of being wonky or off-kilter.
meanings.sent1: The wonkinesses of the old chair made it uncomfortable to sit on.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the wonkinesses in the painting when it hung slightly crooked on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The wonkinesses of the wobbly table made it a challenge to balance a cup of tea.
meanings.sent4: The wonkinesses of the broken compass led them in circles during the hike.
meanings.sent5: The wonkinesses of the wonky bridge made crossing it an adventure.

meanings.definition: Instances of being awkward or unsteady in movement or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The wonkinesses of his dance moves made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent2: She tried to hide the wonkinesses in her walk after tripping on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent3: The wonkinesses of the robot's dance routine entertained the audience.
meanings.sent4: The wonkinesses of the crooked picture frame made the room look disorganized.
meanings.sent5: The wonkinesses of the wonky table caused the dishes to slide off.
